name: Sweet Squire O' Mine!
description:
All heroes need a squire to complete missions! You, my friend, is this Squire! Helping adventures to return alive, or not, to home.

We participate on LudumDare 42, to which the theme is Running out of space. The ideia of this game is you is a squire, working to barbarian worrior adventure and have the mission of help him, collecting all stufs on the dungeon and give to him potions and weapons.
